Package org.wildfly.plugins

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeployExtensionMojo
    Goal which deploys JBoss module to JBoss AS7/WildFly server
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on wildfly-extension-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn wildfly-extension:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    Insert
    An insert item represents 1 edit action to be performed on target XML document.
    JBossModule  
    NamespaceContextImpl  
    RegisterExtension  
    RegisterOptions
    this class just holds all inputs for changes to be made in standalone.xml or domain.xml

    XmlConfigBuilder
